checkCheckbox.name: Cloud Hosting
checkCheckbox.description: Platform or infrastructure services for running software, networking, or processing and storing data.

checkCheckbox.name: Cloud Software
checkCheckbox.description: Applications that are accessed over the internet and hosted in the cloud. e.g. accounting tools or customer service management software

checkCheckbox.name: Cloud Support
checkCheckbox.description: Services to help you set up and maintain your cloud software or hosting services. e.g. migration services or ongoing support
